title: ENCODE Antibody Characterization
description: Schema for submitting antibody characterization data
comment: Complete submitted antibody characterizations are reviewed by the DCC and assigned a status

antibody.description: The specific antibody for which the characterization image applies.
antibody.comment: Programmatic submitters can supply an ENCODE antibody accession or uuid
antibody.title: Antibody to be validated

target.description: Target for which the antibody characterization applies.
target.comment: Programmatic submitters can supply a target uuid, or a specific Target label-Organism name pair
target.title: Antibody target

characterizations.comment: Programmatic submitters can supply a list of characterization uuids for each primary and secondary characterization submitted
characterizations.title: Characterizations

items.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a characterization uuid
items.title: Antibody characterization

status.description: Status code for the Antibody-Target-Characterization triple
status.comment: Use the default, all other values are set by the DCC. The status informs the current state of the antibody characterizations submitted for review
status.title: Approval status
